text: Sudarshan Agarwal (19 June 1931 â€“ 3 July 2019) was an Indian politician. He served as the Governor of Uttarakhand from 2003 to 2007, and the Governor of Sikkim from 2007 to 2008. He was also Secretary-General of the Rajya Sabha from 1981 to 1993. He was born in Ludhiana, Punjab. On 3 July 2019, Agarwal died after a long illness in New Delhi. He was 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha Category:Governors of Uttarakhand Category:Governors of Sikkim Category:Governors of Uttar Pradesh
title: Sudarshan Agarwal
